modName: Paint Themed Main Menu Background Replacer
summary: Beautiful screenshots simplified into psuedo-digital paintings. Replaces the boring skyrim logo with an image of your choice. (Photoshop - Topaz Simplify).
descriptionHtml:
A simple main menu replacement mod to replace the boring black screen with a simple, paint-like screenshot of beautiful locations in Skyrim.

Example:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/16339-1-1335992518.jpg[/img]


Installation:
Simple extract the .zip folder and select which folder you liked based on the images. Then, open that folder and copy its contents to the skyrim folder.

Suggestions for screenshot ideas/locations will be greatly appreciated!

You can check out a few more of the paint-like screenshots on my blog here: http://insane0hflex.blogspot.com/

How I turned the in game screenshots to look like digital paintings - Basically by treating the screenshot to a gratuitous amount of filters/plugins (namely Topaz ones)


Credits:
Hellstorm102\'s original main menu wallpaper replacer-
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3708

VictoriaG for the original inspiration:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16081

And to other community members for feedback/interest.
author: insane0h

files.name: Paint themed main menu replacer by insane0h
